name: Swept Away (WysKyd)
description:
Swept Away is a simple infinite runner where you play as a wayward jellyfish caught in the current. Avoid enemies and see how long you can last!

HOW TO PLAY:

-Use the mouse to navigate around and through enemies.

-Click to restart, and press ESC to exit the game. 

Song is Mystic Riddim by Volfoniq.
